DOC.brief_summary: This trial will explore the efficacy of quetiapine in Social Anxiety Disorder, generalized type. The following elements of response will be tested: number of responders to treatment, time to response, effect size as measured with the LSAS
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Quetiapine in Generalised Social Anxiety Disorder
